mri:keyword.gco:CharacterString: Cited in literature but no information about data access
Information upon request to the data provider
Public national but not EU service
EU service or DS name if available
On-line discovery + viewing + downloading + advanced services (High resolution viewing,3D viewing services, Processing/Mapping services...)

mco:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: Cost charge depends on intended use and category of users

cit:name.gco:CharacterString: Identifier of the dataset in the catalogue
